message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm asking for $20,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer. However, $12,000 is significantly below the value of what this product provides. I'm willing to meet you halfway - how about $17,000?

I'm still interested in the product, but $17,000 is still out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $13,500? I'm trying to find a mutually beneficial price.
